name: Usaka Desert Experience
description: Mystery Peru invites you to be part of this new and unique adventure in the Nazca Valley. Travel across de Nazca desert aboard a dune buggy machine and get the full experience of the beautiful Usaka dunes and build memories that last a lifetime. In addition to the ride on the dunes, we also offer you sand boards so that you can practice one of the ultimate sport of Peru “Sandboarding”. The road to the Usaka desert also features stunning views of the great ancient Citadel of Cahuachi, an enormous city built about 2000 years ago entirely with mud. Along the way you will also see old tombs from pre-Inca times and human remains scattered on the desert floor.
